detail_desc: Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and one inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Scarf in a thin weave with short, raw-edge fringes along the sides. Size approx. 60x200 cm.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Empire-line dress in tulle with sequins and beaded embroidery at the top, concealed buttons at the back and wide shoulder straps layered with puff sleeves that can be pulled over the shoulders. Lined.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Polo shirt in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket, embroidered detail on the chest and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Top in soft organic cotton jersey with lace. Triangular cups with removable inserts and a functional fastening for easier nursing access. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication below the bust and gathers in the sides for best fit. The lining of the cups is made of recycled polyester.
Short jacket in woven fabric with decorative lace trims. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ties at the front.
Jacket in a patterned weave with dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with elastication and a flounce. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated neckline, an elasticated seam at the waist and flared skirt. Flounce at the top and hem. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, a wrapover front with a concealed button and press-stud, and ties at one side. Unlined.
Ankle-length, off-the-shoulder dress in soft viscose jersey with a stripe print. Elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides.
